This is an R5. I dont know exactly what it is, but its like a print released for theatrical distribution in the region 5 described by MPAA, i.e middle to southeast asia.
It has excellent quality but has no audio(mostly the dialouges), to enable dubbing in different language. So audio is taken from a dvdscreener(the print shown to critics) and synced with the R5. The dvdscreener itself does not have that good quality audio, and also produces problems with synching. The result you get is mostly like this movie. 

Audio a little out of synch by the middle to end, a little means a little, and except for the most demanding assholes, its fine. I didnt even notice it, until i read about it in another comment.
Video is 100% great, as expected.No problems.
Some may say waiting for another rip with synced audio, but why wait so long for such a terrible movie.
This movie is just a onetime watch. Marvel at the special effects and laugh at the presentation.
Download, watch , laugh, curse, delete.
Thats what i am gonna do.
Worth the complete download.
V - 10 . A - 7.

Source of information: Wikipedia, and other comments, and months of torrenting.

Just to be clear to the people that don't know, a R5 is a Region 5 DVD rip, Region 5 is Russia. So R5's are a DVD rip with Russian audio, There for, audio is pulled from some where, usually theaters with those audio jacks. But the quality of the audio could be bad. That's why R5 should be labeled as a R5 not a DVDRip, DVDRip is DVD quality video and DVD quality audio.
